Header: Anura Kumara ponders to turn diplomatic missions to commercial links
Content: Presidential Candidate of the National Peoples Power Movement Anura Kumara Dissanayake says all diplomatic service will be turned as commercial diplomatic missions. Anura Kumara Dissanayake was speaking at a public rally held in Thissamaharama to uphold his victory. A large number of supporters were present at the public rally and several JVP leaders addressed the meeting. Anura Kumara Dissanayake observed that the diplomatic officials should be committed to enhance trade ties with the foreign countries. He also promised to create new economic culture in rural areas including Tissamaharama. The Presidential Candidate elaborated that the technological knowhow, financial assistance and other vital support will be given to entrepreneurs in rural areas. According to the presidential hopeful his mission is to create a prosperous country with rich masses.
